marklogic.body: Do you know that hogans statment that this money is "ring fensed" and "goes into the same fund as road tax" is bullshit, our constitution only allowes one fund for all government tax. This man is a bigger lier than kenny! You realy believe "peaseful" is what this shower of unskilled trash deserve? Sorry i believe they need to be Burned out of theri homes, they attempted to into my home, now its time for me to Reach into theirs!
